entry.title: $1750 // Beautiful Renovated Apartment on Nice Quiet Street
entry.content:
NO FEE! Charming is the best way to describe this BED STUY 1BR apartment. Enjoy your own private entrance up to the top floor of this townhouse. The apartment is nicely renovated and is in great condition. It receives so much light from the large windows and skylight. Plus, the bedroom can easily accommodate a queen size bed and additional furniture. Start the year off right with this as your new home.

* Nicely renovated apartment
* Modern kitchen, with built-in microwave
* Very spacious bedroom, brightly lit with double windows
* Bright spacious kitchen, with double windows
* Lots of natural light from multiple windows and skylight
* Fully private entrance and own mailbox
* A and C trains 4 mins away
* Heat and hot water included

Other details:
* First month, last month and security deposit required
* Credit check and proof of stable income
* Application fee: $40
* NO BROKER FEE!

Available for move-in Feb 1.
